author: Jacob Knutson
title: Surgeon general on coronavirus: "This week, it's gonna get bad"
description: "I want America to understand: This week, it's going to get bad," Surgeon General Jerome Adams said Monday on NBC's "Today," referring to the coronavirus outbreak in the United States. Why it matters: The U.S. has reported more than 35,000 coronavirus cases a…
content:
"I want America to understand: This week, it's going to get bad," Surgeon General Jerome Adams said Monday on NBC's "Today," referring to the coronavirus outbreak in the United States.
